title: Were I placed 5 wards???

embed.description: Grab seriously instant screenshots, screen GIFs, and webpage captures. Download the free app for Windows, Mac, browsers, and mobile to save what you see.

body:
I dont know, was I?

Edit: "were" you placed

replies.body: He is commenting on the poor grammar.
It's important to note that certain champions traps, and other such "objects", (for example, Teemo's Shrooms) are *technically* counted as wards, and thus will count towards missions involving wards.
